Grain.Do: Barley (1 cup cooked), Millet (1 cup cooked), Quinoa (1 cup cooked), Brown Rice (1 cup cooked)
Grain.Dont: Wheat (large portions), White Rice (large portions), Heavy, processed grains

Legume.Do: Lentils (1/2 cup cooked), Mung Beans (1/2 cup cooked), Chickpeas (1/2 cup cooked)
Legume.Dont: Heavy beans like kidney beans, Black beans (in moderation)

Veg.Do: Asparagus (1 cup steamed), Broccoli (1 cup steamed), Bitter Gourd (1/2 cup cooked), Green Beans (1 cup steamed)
Veg.Dont: Heavy root vegetables like potatoes (in moderation), Sweet potatoes (in moderation), Tomatoes (in moderation)

Spices.Do: Ginger (fresh, small piece), Black Pepper (pinch), Turmeric (1/2 tsp), Cinnamon (1/4 tsp)

Leafy veg.Do: Spinach (1 cup cooked), Kale (1 cup cooked), Fenugreek Leaves (1 cup cooked)
Leafy veg.Dont: Raw leafy greens in large quantities

Oil.Do: Mustard Oil (1 tsp), Ghee (1 tsp), Olive Oil (1 tsp, used sparingly)
Oil.Dont: Heavy, oily foods, Excessive amounts of any oil

Fruits.Do: Pomegranate (1/2 cup), Apples (1 small, stewed if preferred), Berries (1/2 cup), Dried figs (2-3)
Fruits.Dont: Sweet, heavy fruits like bananas, Mangoes, Melons (in excess)

Milk product.Do: Buttermilk (1 cup, spiced), Goat milk (1 cup, warm)
Milk product.Dont: Heavy cheeses, Yogurt (especially cold), Ice cream

Non-veg.Do: Lean chicken (small portion, steamed/grilled), Fish (small portion, steamed/baked)
Non-veg.Dont: Red meat, Fried or heavy meats, Dairy with meat

Condiments.Do: Lemon juice (small amount), Tamarind (small amount, cooked)
